div.class: custom_141368 content-color well img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated 0

strong.span: Crockett ISD is following Texas State Guidelines
Classes will continue by both Virtual and Paper Assignments.
Students 8th grade and up MUST check your Student Email regularly.
Plans for Graduation are being formulated at this time and

span.strong: ALL UIL activities, including practices, are Cancelled.

span.span: For the safety of our students and community

span.b: Beginning Wednesday, March 25, from 8 am-12:30 pm, we will begin providing a 7-day supply of
for our students when parents pick up homework packets at their child’s campus.
This arrangement will continue every Wednesday until May 27, 2020 and will replace the current schedule of daily meal pick-ups.
Homework and meals will be provided at the following locations

meta.b: Early Childhood Center: Go to the drive through in front of the building.

span.b: Elementary Campus: Drive through the car-rider drop-off area.
Junior High Campus: Drive through the bus lanes behind the school.
High School: Drive through the bus lanes behind the school.

span.span: To receive meals this summer, please follow this link to register:

span.strong: Further updates will be posted on this and
local news media websites and will be broadcast
on local radio stations as needed.

span.span: If you wish to read further about COVID-19, please visit the following websites to find helpful links and the latest information:
The CDC recommends the following steps to reduce the chance of spreading the COVID-19 virus:
• Wash hands frequently and properly (soap and water for 20 seconds). Use hand sanitizer in between.
• Observe proper cough and sneeze hygiene (cough into upper sleeve or tissue; dispose of tissue).
• Keep hands away from eyes, nose and mouth.
• Stay home if you are sick.

strong.span: If you receive a phone call or text from an area code 855 number, it is most likely from CISD.

div.h4: 936.544.2125 is now the only phone number needed for Crockett ISD
div.p: All other numbers are being disabled

div.h4: Crockett Bulldogs and Lady Bulldogs - Every Child - Every time!
Bulldog and Lady Bulldog Sports on KIVY Radio 92.7
Thank you Prosperity Bank, for your contribution toward our new Football Stadium Scoreboard.

div.p: All Phone calls to Crockett ISD must now use 936.544.2125

p.span: "In partnership with our parents, staff, and community, Crockett ISD will provide quality educational experiences for students to succeed in a competitive, diverse, and ever-changing society."

div.span: Website comments are welcome. Contact: webmaster@crockettisd.net . . .

div.p: Crockett I.S.D. is proud of its staff, students, parents and community. We at Crockett I.S.D. consider ourselves blessed to educate and support the children in Crockett, Texas.
